CustomField.description: (22.4) PRM-(717)PRM field used to track Deal Origination Discount Requests from Partner. When this field is checked, a 3rd level approval is required in the Approval Process from the Bus Ops Approver
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Deal Origination Discount (DoD) applies only to Nokiaâ€™s Partner Released products as published on the Partner portal. DoD does not apply to Services nor Non Released products. For further product eligibility clarification- please contact your PSM.
DoD approval will require certain pre-sales activities have been completed and specific deal criteria (e.g. deal size, new business) are met. Consult Partner Program rules on the portal and/or your PSM if you have questions.
CustomField.label: Deal Origination Discount(DoD)Requested
